issue.title: [Website] Create subproject page for Arrow Flight
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15721](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently there is not really a high-level landing page for Arrow Flight on the Arrow site. The closest thing is the [Arrow Flight RPC](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/format/Flight.html) page under **Specifications and Protocols** but that page does not really explain the "why" and quickly gets into technical details. Should we consider adding a new **Arrow Flight** page under {**}Subprojects{**}? We could populate the page with some content from the Arrow Flight and Arrow Flight SQL blog posts.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17494140) by David Li (lidavidm):*
That would be good.

How detailed do we want to get with "Subprojects"? Do Gandiva, the query engine, etc. deserve pages too?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17494142) by David Li (lidavidm):*
This would also be a great chance to reiterate the ideas from the original Flight blog post in a more up to date context

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17494145) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I don't see any "Subprojects" page, are you proposing to create it?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17494174) by Ian Cook (icook):*
There is a **Subprojects** dropdown menu in the top navigation bar on the main page. I'm proposing that we create a new page about Arrow Flight and link to it from that dropdown menu.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17494180) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Ah. Well, the fact that I hadn't seen it speaks a lot about its discoverability :)

The problem is that there are Flight docs already in the main documentation space, so putting an overview in an entirely separate space would probably not be very helpful.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17494209) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Maybe the link could just be to the existing docs page then, and we can spruce up that page?

Relatedly, I think there was an earlier discussion about revamping the home page somewhat? That could be an opportunity to also highlight things like the contributors guide, cookbook, and so on.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17494222) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
I think it would be nice if some documentation expert could help us make things better organized indeed, and help make Arrow more easily understood by first-time readers.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15721?focusedCommentId=17506642) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 197
<https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/197>
